metadata.title: CVE-2023-51798 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Ffmpeg v.N113007-g8d24a28d06 allows alocal attacker to execute arbitrary code via a floating point exception(FPE) error at libavfilter/vf_minterpolate.c:1078:60 in interpolate.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
